resources.string: <shocked>Oh wait!
<yes>We've got an animal in here already waiting for you to take them to their new home...
Why don't you take any animals in their boxes outside first?
<glee>Then we can talk about giving them a new friend.
Welcome to Irwin's Barn. How can I help?
I want to chat
Nevermind
Struth!
Oh, mate.
<pumped>This is bloody deadly!
Best <birthday> ever, mate!
<glee>Wackadoo!
<thinking><PlayerName> pulls through again.
<glee>Thanks again, <PlayerName>!
<yes>I want you to take this as a reward!
This is so great!
Please take good care of <animalJustBoughtName>. <pumped>
I'm going to miss her! <boohoo>
I think <NPCName> is such a sweetheart.
<no>Plants are nice and all, but they just can’t appreciate you the way animals can.
<yes><NPCName> is really open minded when it comes to purchases.
<haha>That man will buy anything!
<sigh>It can be a tough grind talking to <NPCName> sometimes...
<yes>Must be tough for him being that much of a smarty pants, I reckon.
I mean, I can only think about a couple of things at a time, and that’s enough!
<shy>Hearing <NPCName> talk about his wife makes me a little weepy sometimes.
<yes>Hopefully I’ll find somebody that special, one day.
There’s some crazy styles over at <NPCName>'s shop!
I’d love to dress up like a pirate, but I don’t wanna scare the <animalName>s!
<NPCName> has been through so much, and it’s only made her stronger!
<yes>I think we could learn a lot from her.
I keep trying to show off my animals to <NPCName>.
That fella sure loves his critters!
<haha>He doesn’t like ‘em up close though!
I reckon if you dig deep enough, <NPCName>’s got a heart of solid gold.
<haha>Maybe bring two shovels!
G’day, mate! The name is <myName>.
<thinking>You’re… don’t tell me!
You’re <PlayerName>, right? \n Absolutely wonderful to meet you, mate!
<haha>I’m <myName>! Oh, I already told you that, right?
I’m visiting <IslandName> trying to find a home for some beautiful little creatures.
If you have a <AnimalHandlingLicence> come by and talk to me.
<glee>There’s nothing more bonza than looking after a beautiful little creature!
<yes>I hope you can help me out, <PlayerName>.
Oh, <PlayerName>.
Isn’t today bonza!
<glee>And <NPCName> still has a surprise for us!
<dance>You bloody beauty!
<IslandDay>!
<dance>You bloody beauty!
<NPCName> is cooking up a <SnagSizzle>.
She told me she had a special <Snag> for everyone!
<glee>The sky is lovely.
<thinking>You reckon the animals around <IslandName> are bothered by it?
<glee>I doubt it, they are probably loving it too.
What a rippa <IslandDay>!
<NPCName> made me a veggie <Snag>.
It’s bloody beautiful, mate.
She’s a tops, that <NPCName>.
<yes>Animals are great listeners.
<pumped>You can say whatever you want to them and they will barely interrupt you!
Don’t you just think <animalName> are so cute!
They are so little and fluffy!
<glee>And the way they walk!
<pumped>Absolutely beautiful creatures!
You know about <animalName>?
Those animals are beautiful!
<glee>They’re so big, but so gentle.
<yes>They've got big hearts you know? \n Three of them in fact!
<haha>Absolutely amazing!
<animalName> wool is some of the softest wool in the world.
<haha>It might have something to do with the fact that it's nearly always wet.
<pumped>Crikey! \nDo those critters love the water!
<glee>Absolutely beautiful creatures they are!
<animalName> make great companions.
<glee>They are loyal, loving and struth, are they cute.
Oh, and did I mention they are loyal?
<shy>I did?
<haha>Oh, what about how cute they are?
<no>I wasn’t really allowed to have any pets growing up in <SouthCity>.
<shy>I mean, I had some anyway.
<haha>I just wasn’t really allowed to!
<pumped>The <animalName> you find up in the tropical parts of the island can be really fierce!
<yes>I'd keep my distance from their nests if I was you.
<pumped>They've got razor sharp claws and are just brimming with attitude!
<no>I don't get how some people don't like animals.
What's not to like?
Some are slimy, some are poisonous and some even have crackin big teeth!
<pumped>Struth!
<glee>I just love 'em all!
Have you ever gotten a gander of those <animalName>, mate?
<yes>I’ve seen more than a few.
<haha>Crikey, they're real bruteys!
<no>A lot of people have told me that the <BlobFish> back in <SouthCity> was terrible.
<no>I never could bring myself to eat them.
<pumped>They are just too cute!
<proud>I reckon I’ve got one of the best noses in the world.
<yes>Everybody’s always telling me how good it is.
They always say “<myName>, you really smell, mate”
<yes>I could watch animals all day long.
<haha>They’re just always doing something, even when they’re not doing anything.
<glee>Just spectacular!
<thinking>Hmmm, if I could choose to be any animal in the world, huh?
<thinking>I reckon, if I really thought about it... it would definitely have to be...
<haha>A very tough decision.
<yes>Being a great animal handler is all about respect.
<haha>Sometimes you’ve really got to respect the fact that some animals just do NOT wanna be handled.
It’s great here on <IslandName>!
<glee>There are so many critters… crittering around!
<pumped>The place is crawling with life!
<SouthCity> didn’t really have any interesting wildlife, you know.
<thinking>Hmmm…
<haha>I guess some people find <BlobFish> interesting!
<yes>Growing up all I ever wanted to do was look after animals that were in need.
<glee>I don’t know what it is, but I just bloody love all creatures, great and small!
Don’t you just love being outdoors?
The sun on your back, the wind in your hair.
<glee>It’s bloody marvellous, mate.
<thinking>A lot of what I know about animals is maybe a bit outdated these days..
I learnt it mostly through the books I found in <SouthCity>.
<yes>But seeing an animal in real life is totally different to reading about it in a book.
<thinking>I mean, the <animalName> I read about in books doesn’t even have horns!
<no>I’ve never been that fond of bugs.
They’re is just nothing cute about them!
<no>I just can’t see why so many people like to keep them as pets back in <SouthCity>.
<angry>Oh and they have too many legs!
I reckon I’ve had some real friendships with animals, <PlayerName>.
<sigh>But maybe they aren’t real friendships if they can’t talk back…
<shy>Maybe I need to talk to people more!
<animalName> milk is absolutely beautiful!
And it’s good for you too!
<pumped>That stuff will build up your bones really good!
<pumped><animalName> eggs are huge!
<yes>One of those can feed a whole family back in <SouthCity>.
<yes>That’s why people will pay top <Dink> for them.
<thinking>Although, they are super delicate and can be hard to transport.
<shocked><animalName> can breath fire, you know?
<pumped>They have a sac in the back of their throat that can spit a flammable liquid!
<thinking>Not quite sure how they light it up though!
<yes>They can be scary for sure, but I think they are beautiful animals in their own way!
<yes><animalName> horns can be valuable back in <SouthCity>.
<no>Posh people like to use them for cutlery handles and the like.
<no>Kinda gross if you ask me.
<yes>They’re better off just being left on their heads!
The one insect I can get behind is the humble <inventoryItem>.
<glee>Not only are they cute, but they make honey!
<haha>What a sweet thing for a bug to do!
<animalName> are funny little critters, don’t you think?
<haha>They’re slow even when they are trying to be fast.
Those little guys make me laugh when they run!
<animalName> have an absolutely beautiful song, don’t you think?
<glee>Those little guys sing their hearts out.
<thinking>I don’t think I’ve heard anything like it before, to be honest.
Hey <PlayerName>, thank you for being such a good friend!
<glee>You’re bloody bonza, you know that?
You’re a good friend, <PlayerName>.
I’m so glad I came here to <IslandName>.
<yes>I think my life has really changed for the better after meeting you.
I don’t think I’ve ever had a friend like you before, <PlayerName>.
<yes>I mean, I’ve had some good mates who were animals.
<shy>But it’s always good to have a mate that can chat back!
<yes>I’m constantly AMAZED by all the things animals can do.
<worried>Nature can be a bit harsh sometimes, or vicious!
<no>But it’s NEVER boring!
Do you think there are other places out there similar to <IslandName>?
With all their own wildlife?
<glee>I heard there were HUNDREDS of different types of animals before everything went South..
<thinking>Maybe they survived somewhere?
<sigh>I sure hope so...
Animals didn’t do anything to deserve the <Shifts>...
They were just minding their own business whilst people mucked everything up.
<no>It sucks that others have to pay for our mistakes...
<no>Thing is, I don’t think folk in <SouthCity> even know what they’re missing out on.
<pumped>Having a gander at all of this though, they’d be blown away, I reckon!
<thinking>I’d love to have everything in one place one day.
Can you imagine that, <PlayerName>?
A few of each animal type from all over the world, in one location!
Not behind glass or cooped up or anything… we’d make proper enclosures and environments!
They’d have all the room they needed AND all of their favourite foods.
<yes>Everybody would love to see that.
I reckon we’d take better care of nature if everybody saw how beautiful it could be.
<IslandName> is well on the way to being a great place!
<yes>You should be very proud of yourself, <PlayerName>.
<glee>I hope you keep up the great work!
<IslandName> is changing for the better, and it’s all because of your hard work, <PlayerName>!
<glee>Thanks a bunch!
Struth, mate!
Have I told you how great <IslandName> is looking lately?
<pumped>You’ve obviously been putting a lot of work into making this town great, and it’s looking absolutely beautiful, mate!
<IslandName> is looking absolutely beautiful thanks to you, <PlayerName>.
It’s amazing the transformation that this place has gone under.
I can barely recognise the place.
<glee>I bloody love it here!
Oh! That's a <buyItemName>.
Shes a cutie, right?
If you've got a good home for her, she's all yours for <buyItemPrice>.
I'll take it!
No thanks.
Oh great!<pumped>
But you don't have an empty coop for her to stay in!
A <buyItemName> like her needs a coop to stay safe. <yes>
Craft a house for her and place it down somewhere. Once you've done that come back and speak to me. <yes>
That's okay! I'm sure she'll find a home soon! <yes>
Oh! That's a <buyItemName>.
Shes a cutie, right?
If you've got a good home for her, she's all yours for <buyItemPrice>.
I'll take it!
No thanks.
Oh great!<pumped>
Wait, you don't have enough money... <shy>
If you can get it together she will be here waiting for you all day!
That's okay! I'm sure she'll find a home soon! <yes>
<pumped>Struth!
<glee>This is maybe my best <Kite> ever!
It soars just like a beautiful <animalName>!
<glee>Totally grouse!
You beauty!
<dance>It’s <SkyFest>!
I’ve been waiting all year for this!
It’s amazing to see the sky like this!
<yes>I always love a good <SkyFest> celebration.
<glee>But I reckon a <SkyFest> on <IslandName> will always be the best kind of <SkyFest>.
Struth!
I hope you’ve made your <Kite>, <PlayerName>!
I’ve made a beauty of a <Kite>.
Can’t wait to fly it around!
Hey <PlayerName>. I actually have a confession to make.
<shy>I didn’t really choose to leave <SouthCity>.
<haha>I might have been kicked out.
<yes>In fact, I was!
<no>You see, I had been adopting all the animals the people in <SouthCity> couldn’t look after anymore...
<thinking>I guess you could say that it all fell apart when the neighbour under me complained about all the noise coming from my apartment...
<haha>He said it sounded like a zoo in there! \n He was kind of right about that!
<sigh>After that I was...encouraged to leave.
<pumped>So when I left, I told myself I would make a big change and move on to a better place!
<haha>I guess it’s not all bad, because now I get to look after all the fluffy and furry animals I want!
You know why the animals I have in my store need a good home to go to?
<boohoo>People buy these beautiful animals from dodgy traders back in <SouthCity>.
<no>The people that buy then don’t seem to realise that the little beauties eventually get bigger!
Or that they need things like food and water.
<boohoo>Not to mention that they need love!
<proud>So I take them off their hands and pay the <Dinks> needed to ship them to me.
That’s the only reason I charge a fee for the absolutely beautiful little critters.
<glee>For every one that I sell, I can afford to find another one a home too!
<shock>Oh wait!
<yes>I've popped <animalJustBoughtName> in this animal box. Please take her to new home and release her.
<boohoo>I'm going to miss her!
She’s tops, that <NPCName>.
A lot of people have told me that the <BlobFish> back in <SouthCity> was terrible.
The one insect I can get behind is the humble <itemName>.
